statements: SELECT * FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Tractor';
SELECT equipment_name, gps_latitude, gps_longitude FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE gps_latitude > 30;
SELECT equipment_id, last_known_location FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE last_known_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE last_update_timestamp > '2021-10-01';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE gps_latitude < 40 AND gps_longitude > -110 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, gps_latitude DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT equipment_name, gps_latitude, gps_longitude FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Tractor' ORDER BY gps_longitude, equipment_name DESC
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, last_known_location FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE last_update_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_update_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE equipment_type IN ('Harvester', 'Plow') AND gps_latitude BETWEEN 35.5 AND 40.2 ORDER BY equipment_id ASC
SELECT equipment_name, gps_longitude FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE last_known_location LIKE '%farm%' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, gps_longitude DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment_location
SELECT equipment_id, latitude, longitude FROM equipment_location ORDER BY equipment_id DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment_movement WHERE direction = 'North'
SELECT equipment_id, movement_timestamp FROM equipment_movement WHERE speed > 50
SELECT equipment_id, latitude, longitude, location_timestamp FROM equipment_location WHERE equipment_id = 3
SELECT * FROM equipment_location WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM equipment_location WHERE latitude > 10 AND longitude < 20;
SELECT equipment_id, location_timestamp FROM equipment_location WHERE location_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT movement_id, direction, speed FROM equipment_movement WHERE movement_timestamp >= '2022-05-01' ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, AVG(speed) AS average_speed FROM equipment_movement GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING AVG(speed) > 50;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'GPS';
SELECT * FROM GPS_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT equipment_id, timestamp, speed, direction FROM movement_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM equipment WHERE location_latitude > 40 AND location_longitude < -100;
SELECT e.equipment_name, m.speed FROM equipment e INNER JOIN movement_history m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.speed > 50 ORDER BY m.speed DESC;

SELECT gps_id, e.equipment_name, g.timestamp, g.latitude, g.longitude FROM equipment e INNER JOIN GPS_data g ON e.equipment_id = g.equipment_id WHERE g.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Tractor';
SELECT * FROM GPSData WHERE gps_speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Tractor';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;

SELECT farm_name, equipment_name FROM FarmEquipment JOIN Farm ON FarmEquipment.farm_id = Farm.farm_id JOIN Equipment ON FarmEquipment.equipment_id = Equipment.equipment_id WHERE Farm.farm_location_lat > 40 AND Farm.farm_location_long < -100;

SELECT e.equipment_name, f.farm_name FROM FarmEquipment AS fe JOIN Farm AS f ON fe.farm_id = f.farm_id JOIN Equipment AS e ON fe.equipment_id = e.equipment_id WHERE f.farm_location_lat BETWEEN 40 AND 45 AND f.farm_location_long BETWEEN -105 AND -100;

SELECT e.equipment_name, COUNT(fe.farm_id) AS num_farms FROM FarmEquipment AS fe JOIN Equipment AS e ON fe.equipment_id = e.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name HAVING COUNT(fe.farm_id) > 2 ORDER BY num_farms DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE gps_latitude > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, gps_latitude, gps_longitude FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_location WHERE location_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE gps_latitude > 40 AND gps_longitude < -100;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Camera';
SELECT event_type, event_time, event_location FROM equipment_history WHERE event_type = 'Failure' ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 123 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, location_timestamp, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM equipment_location WHERE location_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
